history.proof: intros plp0 plp1 plp2 plp3 n H0 H1 H2 H3 H4. revert plp0 plp1 plp2 plp3 H0 H1 H2 H3 H4. induction n. -- intros plp0 plp1 plp2 plp3 H0 H1 H2 H3 H4. destruct plp0; destruct plp1; destruct plp2; destruct plp3; simpl in *; try congruence. split; reflexivity. -- intros plp0 plp1 plp2 plp3 H0 H1 H2 H3 H4. destruct plp0 as [|a0 b0]; destruct plp1 as [|a1 b1]; destruct plp2 as [|a2 b2]; destruct plp3 as [|a3 b3]; simpl in *; try congruence. injection H4 as H4 H5. injection H0 as H0. injection H1 as H1. injection H2 as H2. injection H3 as H3. specialize (IHn b0 b1 b2 b3 H0 H1 H2 H3 H5). split. ++ hauto use: iad_conv_inj. ++ hauto use: iad_conv_inj.

ctx: intros plp0 plp1 plp2 plp3 n H0 H1 H2 H3 H4.
revert plp0 plp1 plp2 plp3 H0 H1 H2 H3 H4.
intros plp0 plp1 plp2 plp3 H0 H1 H2 H3 H4.
destruct plp0; destruct plp1; destruct plp2; destruct plp3; simpl in *; try congruence.
intros plp0 plp1 plp2 plp3 H0 H1 H2 H3 H4.
destruct plp0 as [|a0 b0]; destruct plp1 as [|a1 b1]; destruct plp2 as [|a2 b2]; destruct plp3 as [|a3 b3]; simpl in *; try congruence.
specialize (IHn b0 b1 b2 b3 H0 H1 H2 H3 H5).
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet ++: Current bullet ++ is not finished.

original: intros plp0 plp1 plp2 plp3 n H0 H1 H2 H3 H4. revert plp0 plp1 plp2 plp3 H0 H1 H2 H3 H4. induction n. -- intros plp0 plp1 plp2 plp3 H0 H1 H2 H3 H4. destruct plp0; destruct plp1; destruct plp2; destruct plp3; simpl in *; try congruence. split; reflexivity. -- intros plp0 plp1 plp2 plp3 H0 H1 H2 H3 H4. destruct plp0 as [|a0 b0]; destruct plp1 as [|a1 b1]; destruct plp2 as [|a2 b2]; destruct plp3 as [|a3 b3]; simpl in *; try congruence. injection H4 as H4 H5. injection H0 as H0. injection H1 as H1. injection H2 as H2. injection H3 as H3. specialize (IHn b0 b1 b2 b3 H0 H1 H2 H3 H5). split. ++ congruence. ++ congruence.
